# Yolo

## This is R markdown.

Let's type somethings

```{r}
print("Yolo")
```

Let's preview dataframe.
```{r}
head(mtcars)
```

Let's try plot Histogram in R
```{r}
hist(mtcars$mpg)
```

## save file use .rmd

## press knit icon for render code open into new window in to many format file.


### how to hind library() message
## when we knit this document when have library() call will show message warning.
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## hind warning message by input ', message = FALSE' in {r}
```{r, message = FALSE }
library(tidyverse)
```

## or hind code input ', echo = FASLE'
```{r, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

### try plot chart
```{r}
ggplot( diamonds, aes(carat, price) ) +
  geom_point()
```

### can fix size chart input ', fig.width = number' in {r}
```{r, fig.width = 3}
ggplot( diamonds, aes(carat, price) ) +
  geom_point()
```
